name: Qusai Bawazir
description:
Extensive experience in Qur’anic instruction, Qira’at and curriculum development with a strong background in teaching, supervising and certifying students worldwide.

Experience and Certifications:

Ijazah in the Qur’an with the ten Qira’at granted by renowned Qur’anic scholars.

Certified in numerous classical works of Tajweed, Qira’at, Hadith, Fiqh and Arabic linguistics.

Supervised and issued Ijaz’at in multiple classical texts in Qira’at and Tajweed to dozens of students.

Founder and Supervisor of the Ihya project, a specialized initiative for Qur’anic education and Qira’at instruction.
